ttScene.ttInitScript: vars:setVar("scissorsFinished","0") vars:setVar("combFinished","0") vars:setVar("tweezersFinished","0") vars:setVar("clawFinished","0") vars:setVar("icePackFinished","0") vars:setVar("whichConfetti","0") vars:setVar("giftsCured","0") vars:setVar("confettiCured","0")

ttOperator.ttScript: return (tweezersFinished == 1 and combFinished == 1 and icePackFinished == 1 and clawFinished == 1 and scissorsFinished == 1)
